ActorTalk: Commandant! Look what I found. It's an arcade!
Uh... that's actually a simulation training facility.
Yeah. Haven't you tried it yet, Nanami?
Nanami? What are you doing here in Babylonia?
...I just remembered, I still have missions to do.
But it totally looks like a game! Look, there's platform jumping and shooting sims... What else could it be?
Wait, don't tell me... it's Babylonia's secret special ops course? So fun! I want to try too!
Oh right! You're F.O.S.'s top graduate, Commandant. You must be amazing at special ops!
Com-man-dant... Teach Nanami how to play!
I want to play with you... Whoa! That score is so high. Commandant, was that your record?
Yeah. Do you want to hear some tips for the game?
No! Even if I got a high score like that, the credit would be yours. I want to figure out the winning formula myself!
On her first try, Nanami scores incredibly high, but it still isn't enough. The Gray Raven Commandant's record stays at the top.
Ugh, so close... One more round! I'm going to beat your high score this time!
Bet you didn't expect this! I came here just to play with you, Commandant!
But wait, how did you even get in here?
Secret! I'm not telling you. And besides...
And you never told me that Babylonia's Commercial District has so many fun places hidden in it.
Besides this arcade, I saw a whole bunch of people over that way. Looks like they're having a lot of fun. Commandant, what's that place?
Want to go check it out together?
Yay! With you here, Commandant, anywhere is fun!
Huh? Are you leaving already, Commandant? I want to play more with you.
